Premium tier at $1499 justified by unique features (podcast syndication, API) absent from competitors
Enterprise tier at $5000 positioned below Cision ($4166+) but premium to Prowly ($258-$416)
All models maintain 93-97% gross margins, providing significant pricing flexibility
Premium Model best reserved for 12-24 months post-launch after brand equity established
Accessible Model risks undervaluation despite strong Pro tier performance
